room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: We completed the Mystery Mansion escape room as a treat for our teenage son during his spring break. It was a lot of fun! The whole family participated and each person contributed. I'd highly recommend Breakout Games!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: I have gone to Breakout Games two times and both have been great experiences! I have done the Museum Heist room as well as Mystery Mansion. It is so much fun to solve puzzles that are challenging and exciting! The game masters I have had were Derek and Christian, both of which made our experiences wonderful. Thanks for the good times, I look forward to coming back!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: Had an awesome time here. The price was definitely worth it.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Columbus in Columbus
review: My family did Island Escape with TJ and returned to do Mystery Mansion with Alexander a couple weeks later. We had so much fun both times and we will definitely be back!!!
